List,

A while back the theme of:

"Small pine trees on small rock islands,
surrounded by wind and waves"

was discussed on one of the lists as a reference to a
particular place, and I believe to a poem. Can anyone
refresh my memory as to the location and relevance of
this place (& theme)?

Curran
